body.transcript:
Hello! Welcome to Harmony Music School. My name is Keith White. How can I assist you today?

Hi, I'm feeling a bit nervous about signing up for classes.

I completely understand. Let's make it easy for you. Could I have your name, please?

Sure, it's Madison Foster.

Nice to meet you, Madison. Don’t worry, we’re here to help. May I know which instrument you're interested in learning?

I'm interested in learning the piano.

Excellent choice! We have wonderful piano instructors. Could you provide me with your phone number in case we need to contact you?

Yes, my phone number is five five five, two three four, one two three four.

Thank you, Madison. Just one more thing, can I get your email address for updates and class schedules?

Sure, it's madison.foster@example.com.

Perfect, Madison. We look forward to having you in our classes. Thank you for choosing Harmony Music School. Have a great day!
